divs: Sighting Detailsi got the idea from the guy in washington state. he would shine a bright light and most often get a flash back or one that would grow and grow then return to normal.it truly does work.but not airplanes who have the red blinkind underneath. that`s a no no. try it with an led that has a tight beam so as to see where your aiming.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Davis City
There were no other sightings in Davis City on or around July 22nd 2010
Summary: to possibly see ufo`s, at night shine an led at stars walking to next twice now it worked.
